channel.title: Research Impl on The Capable Snakekeeper and all his wrongdoings
channel.description: Recent content in Research Impl on The Capable Snakekeeper and all his wrongdoings

item.title: "Meshing Around"
item.description: Dynamic Adaptive Tessellation using D3D12 Mesh Shaders

item.title: Vulkan Grass Rendering
item.description: Generating reactive foliage (grass blades) using Tessellation & Compute Shaders in Vulkan with dynamic LODs and Frustum, Distance, View Culling.

item.title: SDF-based PBR Pokeballs
item.description: Pokeballs made using Signed Distance Fields, implementing realtime PBR, Environment Mapping, Raymarching & Subsurface Scattering.
